messages.title: LABOUR'S TAX ON JOBS WILL KILL THE RECOVERY
messages.content: The election of Gordon Brown's government will bring a worse and more debt, a new recession, 13 years working people have seen their taxes go up and the money wasted building what it was Â£1 billion of waste. They don't want to eat everything they earn to already hard insurance bill.

messages.title: BACKING THE NHS
messages.content: The NHS is our number one priority. We back it and we want to improve it for everyone.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Conservative party opposes Labour's tax increase and advocates for a lower job insurance tax to help the economy recover.
The Conservative party promises to make the NHS their number one priority, implying an intent to invest and improve NHS services.

issues.economy: The Conservative party is against Labour's proposed tax increase.
issues.health: The NHS is the Conservatives' top priority, and they commit to investing in it.

leaflet.personalStatement: It is personal privilege to serve as Wimbledon's MP.

politicalExperience.achievements: Representing the people of Wimbledon in Parliament and delivering on local issues.

contactInformation.address: Wimbledon Conservative Association, 3 Summerstown, London, SW17 0BQ

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet focuses on local involvement and improvements in Wimbledon, such as Nelson Hospital and the local tube service.
